name: SerenitySphere
description: In fast-paced cities like Mumbai, stress, anxiety, and chronic pain are rising, while traditional treatments have limitations. SerenitySphere is an immersive VR-based therapy solution with spatial audio, guided meditation, mindful games, and daily affirmations. It provides a safe, drug-free and engaging way to support mental wellness & pain relief.

name: HomewiseVision
description: AR-based app that helps users visualize and customize house designs using marker-based scanning. It allows free movement inside the 3D model, furniture placement, and real-time cost estimation. Designed for early planning, it ensures smarter decisions, faster execution, and a more engaging home-building experience.
